thoughtText: Ruggles is always booming. Super locals vibe though. Beginners should surf at 1st Beach. The waves are smaller and the crowd is more forgiving.
Hull had a glass day. You dont see that too often on the east coast.
Hampton Beach was wild right before the floods. Lots of barrels.
The best surfer out there is the one having the most fun.
Getting rid of a short board. Comment to get in touch
Someone needs to have a burrito truck at the beach. It would make a killing. Especially in the summer.
Remember to pick up your trash after a day at the beach. Manasquan has been getting pretty bad lately.
No one told me Nauset was going to be so cold in the summer! You need a wet suit for sure.
I'm looking for a new board. Any suggestions?
